name: D/D/D Sage King Alfred
text:
2 "D/D" monsters
During your Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 "D/D/D" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling its materials from your hand, field, and/or banishment into the Deck. If this card is banished: You can target "Dark Contract" Continuous Spells/Traps in your GY and/or banishment, up to the number of "D/D/D" monsters you control; place them face-up on your field. You can only use each effect of "D/D/D Sage King Alfred" once per turn.
